title: Budget Analysis 2020-21 - Fuel subsidy is down 60%, while the entire claims of 2.2L crore on health are a sham (2.2 L includes 35k on vaccines + 65K on some PM scheme which is to be distributed over 6 YEARS!!!)
selftext:
&#x200B;

[Look at items on Petroleum and Healthcare - source - https:\/\/www.indiabudget.gov.in\/doc\/Budget\_at\_Glance\/budget\_at\_a\_glance.pdf](https://preview.redd.it/w7goehfgxue61.png?width=1412&format=png&auto=webp&s=0b7525895da25dba1ceb6e14288f2a83785913fc)
comments: Anyone else agrees that the fuel price was deliberately increased before the budget so as to show a slash in price?
The policy for this budget and the market reaction is best summarised as "No News Is Good News"
Right check out NYC policy on it. Thanks
